column1: Hob was the son of [[Wiseman Gamwich]]. He made his living as a roper in [[Tighfield]],<ref>{{TT
column2: Taming}}</ref> a tradition which was passed along to his son [[Hobson]] and his grandson, [[Andwise Roper
column3: Andy]], who adopted the surname [[Roper Family

column1: Hob was married to [[Rowan]], the daughter of [[Holman the greenhanded
column2: Holman the Greenhanded]]. Their son Hobson was born in {{SR
